 Galvatron was worried. That mouse could not have been impressed by that. 
Even though it was partl;y her fault. And he did wonder hoe that beam through 
the dragon's chest didnt harm it more...but thats the past. He had  taken on 
those two dragons practicly by himself. While her and Neptune made a mess on 
the ground...hed have to show her how to engage a battle better. And the 
elimante of surprise was lost by her when she screamed at them to but the bot 
down  or be shot......such a young bot and so much to learn. His eyes glowed 
bright red. he looked on the scanner. A red alarm went off. His spark burned 
with a fire of a thousand suns. "He's here." Then the blip was gone..."hes 
here and I can feel it....something will have to be done about that."

--part1_e.11ee9bfc.28c0e7ae_boundary
